journal.name: Rate Your Knowledge: What Do You Know About Effective Lesson Planning?
journal.intro:
Tell us what you know about effective lesson planning. Add a journal entry (about 3 sentences) about your understanding of effective lesson planning and tell us if you consider yourself an...
- Effective Lesson Planning Expert--You apply the principles of lesson planning in your teaching every day;
- Effective Lesson Planning Novice--You consider the principles of lesson planning and are learning more about it all the time;
- Effective Lesson Planning Newbie--The term Lesson Planning and its principles are still new to you.
